title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / dialogue pants
description: These are your sleek pants. Put them on and find THE KEY to get out of your room.

dialogueTree.title: Perception (Hearing): "You hear a jingle! Keys are clinkin..."
dialogueTree.text: You hear a jingle! Keys are clinking in the pocket of your flare-cut pants.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "It says "Whirling-in-Rags" on the a..."
links.text: It says "Whirling-in-Rags" on the aluminium keyring. There is a single key on the ring, the number #1 is etched on it. It should open the door.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The "Whirling-in-Rags" is a hostel-..."
links.text: The "Whirling-in-Rags" is a hostel-cafeteria on the urban coast, frequented by dockworkers.
